code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{FaCalendarAlt,FaTicketAlt}from'react-icons/fa';import'./ExhibitionCard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExhibitionCard=_ref=>{let{exhibition}=_ref;const{id,title,short_description,image_url,start_date,end_date,ticket_price}=exhibition;const formatDate=dateString=>{const options={year:'numeric',month:'long',day:'numeric'};return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString(undefined,options);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"exhibition-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"exhibition-card-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL.replace('/api',''),"/").concat(image_url),alt:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"exhibition-card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"exhibition-dates",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCalendarAlt,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[formatDate(start_date)," - ",formatDate(end_date)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"exhibition-price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaTicketAlt,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\u20BD",ticket_price]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"exhibition-description",children:short_description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/exhibitions/".concat(id),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"\u0411\u043E\u043B\u044C\u0448\u0435 \u0434\u0435\u0442\u0430\u043B\u0435\u0439"})]})]});};export default ExhibitionCard;
